headline.main: For V.A. Hospitals (and Patients), a Major Health Victory

docs.abstract: One in 25 patients who goes into the hospital without an infection will get one there. The V.A. is leading the way in bringing those numbers under control.
docs.snippet: One in 25 patients who goes into the hospital without an infection will get one there. The V.A. is leading the way in bringing those numbers under control.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Soul-searching in France in the weeks since Islamist gunmen killed 17 people has centred on battling radical Islam and reinforcing the country's secular tradition. In the "cités", housing estates like those in which the gunmen grew up, this seems to many like seeking a scapegoat for decades of neglect.

headline.main: In France's Suburbs, State Neglect Breeds Resentment
